short_summary: RFP for 7 and 5 units of Nonmetallic Hose NSN 4720-00-817-7781
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below...
tags: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (UK)
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal - Department of National Defence
### Submission Deadline: November 15, 2022, 2:00 PM EST

The Department of National Defence is soliciting proposals for the procurement of specific nonmetallic hoses, as outlined in the solicitation documents. This request for proposal (RFP) is open to all interested bidders.

### Tender Details

* **Primary Item**: Nonmetallic hose (NSN 00-8177781)
* **Quantity**:
	+ 7 units, to be delivered to CFB Halifax
	+ 5 units, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt
* **Item Description**: The required nonmetallic hoses have a specific part number (H0S-22240-7A-420L) and NCAGE (32142).
* **Language**: Documents may be submitted in either English or French.
* **submission Method**: Respondents must submit their proposals electronically.

### Proposal Evaluation Criteria

* The evaluation criteria for this procurement are as follows:
	+ Relevance and feasibility of the proposed solution
	+ Price and pricing strategy
	+ Product quality and compliance with specifications
	+ Delivery schedule and logistics

### Additional Information

* The Department of National Defence retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* The Crown preferentially buys Canadian.
* This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

### Contact Information

* For additional information or to submit a proposal, please contact:
	+ Sarah Brown, Contract Officer
	+ Email: [sarah.brown@forces.gc.ca](mailto:sarah.brown@forces.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: 819-939-3813

### Solicitation Documents

The solicitation documents, including the RFP and amendment one and two, are available on the [Canadabuyssite](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub) for download.

Please note that this RFP is now closed, as the tender closing date has passed.
